overview:
Stefan Lechere is Vice President Business Development at Netvibes. He is in charge of alliances, partnerships and business relationships with major online and offline players in EMEA.

Prior to his appointment at Netvibes, Stefan Lechere was Strategic Partnership Development Manager at Google Europe. He joined Google early 2004 with responsibilities for AdSense partnerships and local/maps content partnerships in France. In 2006, Lechere was also in charge of Google Video / YouTube content partnerships as well as relationships with producers, broadcasters and right-owners.

In 1999, Stefan Lechere was the Business Development Manager for the portal activities of Club-internet and T-Online France which he joined after a ‘start in his online career’ with Lagardere Group (Hachette Filipacchi). Earlier in his career, Stefan Lechere was International Product Manager at L’Oreal in Sweden.
